Swarm of Bats.explanation: Both are large swarms of flying creatures that can occupy the same space and attack in numbers.

Gibbering Mouther.explanation: Both are swarms of many small creatures forming a single monstrous entity with a disturbing, mind-affecting presence.

Will-o-Wisp.explanation: Shares the mystical, flying, and psychic nature with innate spellcasting and a haunting presence.
